summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Gaming Headphones Chamvict Xbox One Headset with Stereo Sound Ps4 Headset with Mic Noise Canceling for PS4,PC,Laptop,Cell Phone,Xbox,Find Enemies Before They Find You Review Date: 2019/07/05 Store: Chamvict Product Description: ['Why to choose us', "1. 【Splendid stereo audio output】Bring you an immersive game experience with stereo sound.You can get clear sound and accurately judge the enemies’ direction especially in “Playerunknown's Battlegrounds” 2. 【360° Noise canceling mic】We adopt intelligent chip to cancel outside noise.Just enjoy your own game world.You can judge the enemies direction and shoot in time without any noise.Victory is yours!The mic is flexible and can be adjusted to different angle for 360° 3. 【Comfy for long time wearing】With an extreme light of 0.87pounds, it is professionally designed for long time wearing and relieve your tiredness.The earmuff is breathable and soft, which can give your ear a comfy touch with less stress and keep cool when gaming for long time 4. 【Skin-friendly earmuff】Made of superior PU leather material, the earmuff is friendly to your skin 5. 【Convenient volume and mic adjustment】You can adjust game sound volume via the pulley and turn on/off mic via the switch anytime when don’t use it", 'Tips for PS4', '1. Plug 3.5mm cable into the console 2. Long press PS4 button and go to system setting 3. Go to “PERIPHERAL MACHINE”, ”ADJUST SOUND AND DEVICES”, choose “OUTPUT TO THE HEADPHONES”, select “ALL AUDIO”', 'Multiple platform compatibility', '★Play station 4 ★Nintendo switch/3DS ★Cell phone with 3.5mm audio interface ★Xbox one/360: It need a microsoft adapter(not included) when connect to old version xbox one ★Laptop/PC/macbook: Need a pc extension cord(included), plug mic and audio cord into your PC, laptop, macbook', 'Specification', '★Drive Diameter: 50mm ★Frequency: 20HZ-20KHZ ★Sensitivity: 102±3DB ★Mic Diameter: 4.0×1.5mm ★Mic Sensitivity: -38±3DB ★Cable Length: 6.6ft ★Size: 8.1×4.1×8.7inch ★N.W.: 0.873pounds ★G.W.: 1.12Pounds'] Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Chamvict', 'Color': 'Black', 'Form Factor': 'Over Ear', 'Connectivity Technology': 'Wired', 'Special Feature': 'Noise Canceling, Microphone Included', 'Package Dimensions': '9.1 x 7.8 x 4.3 inches; 1.09 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'Dongguan Guanbiao Trading Co.,Ltd'} Review Text: I am not a serious gamer. I don’t stream or use the microphone much. I mostly wanted these for the headphones for sound.

I think they are great for what I needed. I’m not sure if I would recommend them for serious gamers/streamers.

The cups are very big on the ears, but it feels very comfortable. You can control volume on the cord, which is nice.

I feel like they are a good value for the price. Review Title: Good value for the price Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: lilah b. - Bronzed Beauty Bronzer Duo - b. sunkissed - Multipurpose Bronzer Duo to Highlight + Contour and Blend Review Date: 2020/06/25 Store: LILAH B Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'LILAH B', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Style': 'Compact', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 3.5 x 1 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'UPC': '851078006100'} Review Text: The best part of this bronzer duo is the packaging. The container holding the bronzer and highlighter is very heavy. It is either made of ceramic or metal. It took me a minute to figure out how to open the compartment. The top part slides to the right to show the bronzer/highlight duo.

The bronzer does a good job. It goes on my skin very smoothly. It is a naturally bronze color. This shade is for light shaded skin tones. I don’t think the bronzer is dark enough for medium/dark skin tones.

The highlight isn’t shimmery enough for me. In the picture I posted with this review, I used the bronzer from this product and a different highlight.

The bronzer and packaging were a hit for me, but the highlighter was a miss. I am not sure if I feel the quality is worth the price. If it was a lower, price I would think of ordering again. Review Title: Nice bronzer and packaging Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: OLEWELL Valentine's Day Mini Rubber Bands Soft Elastic Bands for Kids Hair Non-slip Rubber Hair Bands Soft Hair Elastics Ties Bands Braids Hair for Girls - STRONG - REUSEABLE (Total 1 Pack, Pack of 1000, BlackColorful1000) Review Date: 2020/07/28 Store: OLEWELL Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'OLEWELL', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '8 x 5.02 x 0.8 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SML'} Review Text: I use little hair bands like these every day for my husband’s hair. He has very long hair, and he works manual labor. Every morning, I slick his hair back in a braid. It is important I use nice hair elastics, so the braid stays on all day. I have tried ones from a local dollar store that weren’t very sturdy; they kept breaking off during the day.
I decided to give these a try. I am impressed by the quality. The elastics are sturdy. The elastic stayed put in his hair for 24 hours through work and sleep.
This product comes with a lot of hair bands! It comes with a convenient and cute little pouch to store the bands in. The pouch has a bird on a floaty and says “I can’t swim” Review Title: Nice sturdy elastics in fun colors Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: LAPCOS Good Morning Fresh Quick Masks (30 Count) Daily Sheet Masks for Beauty & Skin Care - Hydrating and Moisturizing Korean Face Mask with Witch Hazel, Aloe Vera & Cucumber Review Date: 2020/07/31 Store: LAPCOS Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'LAPCOS', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Cucumber', 'Skin Type': 'Normal', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 4 x 3 inches; 1 Pounds', 'UPC': '818929024478'} Review Text: Did you skip your skin case routine before bed? Did you then proceed to wake up too late to do it in the morning? Look no further for your solution!
I really enjoy these quick morning masks. Sometimes my face needs refreshing before I put my makeup on in the morning, but I rarely wake up early enough to wait for a 15-20 min mask to set in. This mask is perfect, because you only need 5 minutes. I put mine on and I make my coffee and feed my cats. By the time I’m done with that, it’s about time to take off the mask and start getting ready.
The mask moisturized and refreshed my skin. My face felt ready to put my makeup on. It didn’t make my face too oily for my makeup or anything. My makeup set in nicely.
The packaging is nice. It is similar to a tissue box. There are little tweezers to help you grab out a mask.
I have tried some other types of masks from this brand, and this is my favorite I have tried from Lapcos. I would use this product again. Review Title: Quick morning mask! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Caudalie Vinosource SOS Intense Hydration Set: Hydrating Trio for Sensitive Skin including a Daily Foam Cleanser, Hydrating Serum, Facial Moisturizer Review Date: 2020/11/23 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.93 x 5.35 x 2.64 inches; 14.5 Ounces'} Review Text: Perfect gift for your skin-care loving friend!
I have loved this skin care set. I have been using all 3 products almost every day for the past 3 weeks. The gift/value set comes with a instant-foaming face wash, serum, and face moisturizer. This is my first time trying this brand, and I am very impressed.

The instant-foaming face wash:
I have never tried an instant-foaming wash before. It still produced a nice lather on my face. It is great for a daily moisturizer, but I still like to use an exfoliant every few days.

The serum:
The serum had a more creamy texture. It soaked into my skin quick. It created a nice based for the moisturizer.

The moisturizer:
The moisturizer was thick and creamy. I have VERY dry skin, and my skin soaked it right up. It felt really nice on my skin. My skin stayed moisturized throughout the day after using in the morning.

None of the products irritated my skin. I have dry skin with some rosacea. All products had a similar light floral scent. The sizes are great. I still have plenty of product after using a few weeks.

I recommend this set! The packaging is nice and aesthetically pleasing. It is readily giftable. Review Title: Perfect gift for skin-care lovers! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: COSMOCOS FromNature Perfect Cover BB Cream - Light Beighe/Natural Beige SPF 50+ / PA+++ Sun Protection, Natural Skin Tone, High Coverage Korean Cosmetic K Beauty - 50g (1.76 fl oz) (Natural Beige) Review Date: 2020/12/18 Store: COSMOCOS Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'COSMOCOS', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.72 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Skin', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 1.5 x 1 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '364597179557'} Review Text: Overall, I do really like this BB cream. Here are my pros and cons.

PROS:
-The BB cream is moisturizing. I have super dry skin, and it felt replenishing.
-This cream provided great coverage despite it being a thinner consistency.
-I put it on my face to even skin tone on “no make up days” and I also use it with my normal make up routine.
-The price is very fair for the quality.
-This cream has high SPF, so it is perfect for summer days. Sun screen is an important part of skin care routine, so it is nice to have the BB cream and sun screen combined.

CONS
-This BB cream might be too dewy for oily skin. It is perfect for dry skin though.
-This made my fine lines stand out more if I didn’t blend it in super well.

There are more pros than cons to this BB cream. I would order it again. Review Title: Nice BB cream! Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

-This BB cream might be too dewy for oily skin. It is perfect for dry skin though.
-This made my fine lines stand out more if I didn’t blend it in super well.

There are more pros than cons to this BB cream. I would order it again. Review Title: Nice BB cream! Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
raw_response:
**Keywords and Trends:**

1. **Gaming Accessories**: Prefers products that enhance audio quality for gaming, highlighting comfort and noise cancellation features. Uses headphones primarily for sound, rather than streaming or communication.

2. **Beauty and Skincare Products**: Strong interest in skincare and makeup. Favors multitasking items (e.g., bronzers with highlighters) that offer convenience and quality. Showcases particular appreciation for effective moisturizing products suited for dry skin.

3. **Practical Usage**: Purchases often emphasize practicality and functionality, such as the need for durable hair elastics for daily use and quick-application skincare masks. 

4. **Quality Over Quantity**: Values product quality and is willing to invest in higher-quality items, particularly for skincare. Reviews reflect a desire for effective, comfortable, and reliable products.

5. **Feedback on Aesthetics**: Enjoys aesthetically pleasing packaging, indicating appreciation for well-designed products.

6. **Low-Maintenance Solutions**: Seeks products that provide quick solutions, such as fast-acting masks for busy routines and lightweight BB cream with moisturizing benefits.

Overall, this person exhibits a balanced preference for gaming and beauty products that prioritize comfort, effectiveness, and ease of use, coupled with an eye for good design and practical applications.

target_interaction.title: Perfect for any scrunchie lover
target_interaction.text:
This scrunchie stand comes readily giftable being fully assembled with 8 scrunchies attached.
In my photo, I have 11 scrunchies on the stand. They aren’t very scrunched together, so there can be more room. I believe you could fit around 20 depending on the size of the scrunchie.
I love having a small space to keep my scrunchies. Now I won’t lose them all!
